dict.acceptation: 地球；地表，陆地；尘事，俗事；兽穴；
把（电线）接地；盖（土）；追赶入洞穴；

sent.orig: A Book entitled Earth is a Basic reference textbook in many universities around the world.
sent.trans: 有一本名为Earth[地球]的书是全球多所大学的基本参考教科书。

sent.orig: Compare earth, ground, floor and soil.
sent.trans: 将earth、 ground、 floor、 soil这几个词作一比较。

sent.orig: There is a simple beauty in ship, shop, walk, free, earth, mate, man, fried.
The memories of the First Age are dim, and all things in Middle-earth grow colder.
sent.trans: 关于第一纪的记忆模糊了，Middle-earth上的一切事物都在老去。

sent.orig: The earth is broken up, the earth is split asunder, the earth is thoroughly shaken.
sent.trans: 地全然破坏，尽都崩裂，大大地震动了。
